titleInfo.title: Convex vNM-Stable Sets for linear production games

mods.abstract: We characterize convex vNM-Stable Sets according to von Neumann and Morgenstern for orthogonal linear production games with a continuum of players. The results of Rosenmüller & Shitovitz [International journal of game theory 29 (2000), pp. 39-61] are thereby substantially improved. Simultaneously, this is a corrigendum concerning the proof of a lemma in our first paper.
